channel.title: Blog posts | Ocsk칩 N치ndor
channel.description: Welcome to my blog! I post here ocassionally about web development, my projects, IT related stuff and many other things.

item.title: ASP.NET Core - Changing the OpenApi type of a class
item.description: See how you can change the type of a property that you defined in the generated OpenApi documentation for an ASP.NET Core API. This is particularly useful if you have a custom model binder for the type of the property.

item.title: Getting started with the MVC pattern
item.description: Learn the basics of the MVC pattern and get a feel for how it works. This blog post is for you if you are completely new to MVC or to web development in general.

item.title: The evolution of my portfolio website
item.description: Ayy! Welcome to my new portfolio/personal website. In this blog post I'm going to go over the evolution of my portfolio website and how it got to where it is today.
